mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id AS user_id, ap.app_id AS app_id, a.permission AS permission FROM gar_users u LEFT JOIN gar_user_application ap ON ap.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gar_user_dept ud ON ud.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gar_role_dept rd ON rd.dept_id = ud.dept_id LEFT JOIN gar_role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = rd.role_id LEFT JOIN gar_permissions p ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN gar_resources m ON m.path LIKE p.wildcard LEFT JOIN gar_resource_api mp ON mp.resource_id = m.resource_id LEFT JOIN gar_apis a ON mp.api_id = a.api_id WHERE m.status = 1 AND a.status = 1 AND a.permission NOTNULL
